text.title: Look and Feel Fabulous
text.head: Look and Feel Fabulous
text.p: Are you bored with your life. If you are lacking friends, fun, and beauty read on!
text.head: Steps
Beauty

list.item: Wash and condition your hair and let it dry naturally. For a fab new hair look, start to twist your hair. It will start to coil keep going 'till it becomes a bun. Tie it up in a bun and spray hairspray on it for texture. For a girlie twist, use a scarf to tie it even more tightly. If that look isn't for you, then let put some product through your hair to suit your hair type and let it dry naturally. A lot of the time, natural looks better.
Use a pale hypoallergenic nail polish.
Use baby moisturizer to keep your skin silky smooth. Remember to concentrate on the elbows, knees and anywhere that you get dry skin.

Use a foundation that matches your skin tone. Don't listen to what the girl at the beauty counter is saying! She may say get a darker foundation to make you look 'sun kissed', but that's all wrong. Get a foundation that suits you! The key to amazing foundation is that it has to look like you haven't got any on. And to do that, you need it to look like your natural skin colour.

Apply eye-shadow and mascara. Search up tutorials on how to do eye make-up that best suits your eye type. It's important that you don't try and mask or change your features, just enhance them, because you're beautiful.
Slick on a bit of lippy or lip balm.

text.head: Friends and Fun

list.item: Talk to people you don't know - Introduce yourself and talk about movies and websites. People are drawn to others with confidence, so make sure that you ooze confidence.
Exercise at a club (such as netball, basketball and football). You will have fun and make friends!
Writing can be fun, so write to your friends if you are bored and haven't seen them in a while. (You won't run up a huge phone bill if you do it often.)
Instead of going straight home after school go for a quick jog somewhere close to your home. You won't feel as tired at home. (Ask parents first!)
Just dance! You'll instantly smile.
Wear a little bit of body spray to smell lovely and feel great too.

text.head: Tips

list.item: Be yourself no matter what anyone says.
Try to have a positive mind no matter what.

text.head: Warnings

list.item: Have fun, but don't endanger yourself or others!
Writing letters requires stamps in order to mail the letters, and stamps can be expensive.
Don't get obsessed about your weight, you're beautiful and fabulous no matter what anyone says.

text.head: Things You'll Need

list.item: Shampoo
Conditioner
Bobble
A scarf
Pale hypoallergenic nail polish
Baby moisturizer
Foundation
Eye-shadow
Mascara
